monsters.name: Volcanic
monsters.description: Fire-proof. Lives in volcanoes and devours molten magma-rocks.

monsters.name: BigTurtle
monsters.description: Slow-going. Moves around in giant caverns where it eats rocks and bugs.

monsters.name: TreeSpidr
monsters.description: Reclusive. Hunted close to extinction for its lumber and spider silk.

monsters.name: DarkBunny
monsters.description: Malevolent. Tricks people and steals their prized belongings from them.

monsters.name: FloraDino
monsters.description: Heavy-weight. Drinks a lot of water and waddles about in random directions.

monsters.name: CarrotBoy
monsters.description: Mischievous. Likes rock n' roll and sipping from a cold bottle of soda.

monsters.name: SkulSword
monsters.description: Spookily rad. Is skilled with a blade and can run like the wind.

monsters.name: HeartBird
monsters.alt: Bird with a heart on its head
monsters.description: Very rare. Builds its nests on top of roofs and is considered lucky.

monsters.name: Uproot
monsters.description: Light-weight. Floats limply in the air and entangles its prey with its roots.

monsters.name: GiantYeti
monsters.description: Frost-biter. Lives out a lonely life in ice caves in the frosty north.

monsters.name: BookShade
monsters.description: Frightening. A shadow that hides in books waiting for readers to find it.

monsters.name: ClayHead
monsters.description: Extra-goopy. Slops around in mud-filled plains. Eats roots and small fish.

monsters.name: FakeSword
monsters.alt: Sword in a evil looking stone
monsters.description: Real phony. One of many fake swords-in-stones designed to trick heroes.

monsters.name: Gargoyle
monsters.description: Sculpted. Screams then leaps from roofs onto unsuspecting travelers.

monsters.name: Lobster
monsters.description: Territorial. Walks around on the bottom of the ocean picking fights.

monsters.name: BeeGrunt
monsters.description: Low-level. Does the boring jobs such as cleaning and paperwork.

monsters.name: BabyYeti
monsters.description: Cold-proof. Hunts around through ice plains looking for lost hikers.

monsters.name: DryFlame
monsters.description: Ghostly-fire. Sits alone in old castles. Its flames can't be blown out.

monsters.name: PinTurtle
monsters.description: Super-speedy. Runs on its long legs at speeds in excess of 60mph.

monsters.name: BrainTree
monsters.description: Beast-brain. An experiment gone wrong. It attacks anything that moves.

monsters.name: Wrestler
monsters.description: Executioner. Has never been beat, and is known for its black hood.

monsters.name: Bug
monsters.description: Blank-starer. Can fly, but prefers to pad about on its own two feet.

monsters.name: SkulLucha
monsters.description: Theatrical. Pauses during fights to start chants of its stage name.

monsters.name: Mushroom
monsters.description: Grabby-fungi. Dispenses clouds of toxic fumes to suffocate its prey.

monsters.name: CaveFrog
monsters.description: Froglodyte. Lives on tropical mountains and is visually challenged.

monsters.name: BrnLizard
monsters.description: Peely-skin. Stayed in the sun without a strong enough sun-tan lotion.

monsters.name: CactiBros
monsters.description: Cacti-stack. A pair of siblings on the wrong side of the law.

monsters.name: BigSheep
monsters.description: Boxing-champ. A huge fluffy sheep that's been training to be a heavyweight.

monsters.name: Screature
monsters.description: Tricky-thief. Loves flying into peoples houses and taking their money.

monsters.name: SaleSnake
monsters.description: Serpentine. Sells his products for way more than they are worth.

monsters.name: Firebird
monsters.description: Spicy-fowl. Flutters through the air sending fire onto those below.

monsters.name: CactiPilr
monsters.description: Hide-n-seek. Likes to hide in plain sight, hoping to be left alone.

monsters.name: GaspFish
monsters.description: Water-yeller. A strange fish with a tendency to scream very loudly.

monsters.name: Tornado
monsters.description: Atmospheric. A tornado thug with an attitude. Currently unemployed.

monsters.name: Cryptic
monsters.description: Red-oddity. It is an extremely rare monster that collects shiny things.

monsters.name: RedDragon
monsters.description: Aggressive. Can't fly, but can jump really far with its two legs.

monsters.name: Fortress
monsters.alt: Beast with a mountain on its back
monsters.description: Impenetrable. A moving mountain that eats forests, towns, and castles.

monsters.name: Clayman
monsters.description: Red n' goopy. A clay soldier that will follow its leader anywhere.

monsters.name: AlienKing
monsters.description: Kindly-royal. A green king with heart of gold. It is slightly brash.

monsters.name: Watcher
monsters.description: Odd-guardian. Was created out of old parts and has trouble talking.

monsters.name: Gnum
monsters.description: Empty-minded. Can only eat flowers. Gardeners think it's a pest.

monsters.name: Urchin
monsters.description: Sewer-slime. Hides in puddles and rises out to attack its prey.

monsters.name: Arbiter
monsters.description: Pacifist-eye. A regal clay eyeball with a strong sense of justice.

monsters.name: StormHead
monsters.description: Thunder-head. It is the life of the party when it's not working.

monsters.name: Fluffster
monsters.description: Silky-haired. Works as a guard from 6am-3pm. Wants to work from home.

monsters.name: KingSpidr
monsters.description: Reclusive. Thirsts for flesh and has a beautiful singing voice.

monsters.name: ClayOwl
monsters.description: Goopy-statue. It's too heavy to fly, so it just bounces in place.

monsters.name: GuardBot
monsters.description: Out-of-date. Guardian of storage rooms. Writes books in its spare time.

monsters.name: SkulSpidr
monsters.description: Trail-blazer. Ever on the move, it has no home and stops only to eat.

monsters.name: Ghoulish
monsters.description: Gloopy-ooze. Wrangles fish deep in the sewers. It's waiting for a world-record.

monsters.name: DarkShade
monsters.description: Monstrous. Hunts in the dark shadows. A dark creature of legend.

monsters.name: DarkMattr
monsters.description: Consuming. Moves without making a sound. A dark creature of legend.

monsters.name: DarkEel
monsters.description: Disastrous. Destroys fishing villages. A dark creature of legend.

monsters.name: DarkBeast
monsters.description: Calamitous. Flies low over villages at night. A dark creature of legend.

monsters.name: DarkSkull
monsters.description: Grotesque. A monster from the briny depths. A dark creature of legend.
